EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-04-18-Kentucky Derby Raffle Send.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Want Two Tickets to the Kentucky Derby? |Spend 30 Minutes with a Turbonomic Engineer for a Chance to Win
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/XRDTN8K?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=[marketo_zs00ja7e8g_value]&marketo_ff0s7l5qls=[marketo_ff0s7l5qls_value]&marketo_olh86f3r9s=[marketo_olh86f3r9s_value]&marketo_day0sfb59s=[marketo_day0sfb59s_value]&marketo_qqebotxyuo=[marketo_qqebotxyuo_value]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, At Turbonomic we understand that vendor meetings can sometimes take away from time that could be spent with friends and family. Our mission is to give that time back to you, before you even consider becoming a Turbonomic customer. This is why we want to take a step back, let you know that we understand your time is extremely valuable and extend an offer that will give you time back for any time spent with us. We are offering the chance to win one of 4 pairs of tickets to the Kentucky Derby at Churchill Downs on Saturday, May 6th, 2017. Simply take a few minutes to fill out our 143rd Kentucky Derby Turbonomic Giveaway <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/XRDTN8K?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=[marketo_zs00ja7e8g_value]&marketo_ff0s7l5qls=[marketo_ff0s7l5qls_value]&marketo_olh86f3r9s=[marketo_olh86f3r9s_value]&marketo_day0sfb59s=[marketo_day0sfb59s_value]&marketo_qqebotxyuo=[marketo_qqebotxyuo_value]]]>, and meet with one of our Turbonomic Engineers to be entered into the giveaway. One Grand Prize winner will receive a pair of Reserved Seating Tickets, and 3 lucky winners will receive a pair of General Admission Tickets for the Kentucky Oaks & Kentucky Derby on Friday, May 5th, 2017, and Saturday May 6th, 2017. <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/XRDTN8K?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=[marketo_zs00ja7e8g_value]&marketo_ff0s7l5qls=[marketo_ff0s7l5qls_value]&marketo_olh86f3r9s=[marketo_olh86f3r9s_value]&marketo_day0sfb59s=[marketo_day0sfb59s_value]&marketo_qqebotxyuo=[marketo_qqebotxyuo_value]]]> The Giveaway will end on Friday, April 28th, 2017 so make sure to fill out your submission today for a chance to win! -The Turbonomic Team
